ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a matte neoprene-coated finish rests on a light surface. Each end cap is flat and clearly printed with the KAKSS brand and weight marking, giving a clean, modern look while preventing rolling and offering a secure, comfortable grip.
